Description: Adestra is a worldwide leader of one-to-one email and lifecycle marketing solutions for global and growing brands.
Name: Upland Adestra

Methods.Name: Search Contacts By Email
Methods.Description: Fetches all matching contacts in the specified core table. Custom response fields can be added in the format methodResponse.[contacts].<fieldname> e.g. methodResponse.[contacts].firstname

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Adds a new contact record. Custom request fields can be added with the format "methodCall.fields.<fieldname>$<datatype>. e.g. methodCall.fields.firstname$string

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Fetches all contacts.  Custom response fields can be added in the format methodResponse.[contacts].<fieldname> e.g. methodResponse.[contacts].firstname

Methods.Name: Add Contact to List
Methods.Description: Adds a contact to a list. No action is taken if the contact is already on the list.

Methods.Name: List Contact Lists
Methods.Description: Returns the lists the contact is in.
